page.title: 10Dinmore Caravans Ltd.
page.content: Dinmore Caravans is owned by Mr Glen Williams.He{sells new}and{used {caravans.}He is an agent for Avondale & Lunar caravans.He sells all makes of used ones.His business offers full {cash & credit purchase facilities}plus a special workshop for{all caravan {repairs}& pre sale requirements.As well as touring vans,he{sells large {residential ones.}To the rear of his display forecourt is a small{caravan {site}for these residential caravans. This site covers{about 1 acre}and has on it{10 of these mobile homes,}as they are called.Each one has mains water,flush toilet & mains electricity The expected life of mobile homes is 25 years.Touring vans a lot less. Mr Williams employs 1 caravan fitter. His firm is open{364 days a year,}from {9.00am-6.00pm.}He sells Calor gas and other caravan accessories in a shop
